alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 21 at 3:18AM EST until February 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until 1 PM this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding and will fall to around 14.5 feet by 1 PM today and recede further to around 10.0 feet by 7 AM on Wednesday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 1 PM this afternoon.
